name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior AI Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications with a strong emphasis on **Python** and MLOps. Demonstrated expertise in leveraging AI/ML technologies, particularly with **OpenAI** and **Anthropic**, to create predictive models and intelligent applications. Proficient in using frameworks and tools such as **LangChain**, **LangGraph**, **Agno**, **CrewAI**, **Qdrant**, **Milvus**, **Pinecone**, and **pgvector** to drive innovation in AI solutions. 
Experienced in deploying scalable cloud-native systems on **AWS**, including the use of **AWS Bedrock** for enhanced AI capabilities. Skilled in implementing modern software development practices such as CI/CD pipelines and microservices architecture. 
Adept at ensuring compliance with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS while developing solutions. Strong background in orchestrating MLOps for model training and deployment using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to delivering impactful software solutions across the healthcare and financial sectors.
